pages.text: On the Lithum Altar, you can perform rituals that will enhance some of the enchantments which the item has. For each ritual, the level will increase by one and can reach values higher than you can get on the enchanting table or with a combination on the anvil.

To start the enchantment rituals, you will also need:$(br)$(li)$(#ea7f17)$(l)10 000 DE$()$(li)$(#59983a)$(l)Experience levels$(), which is five times higher than the current level of the desired enchantment$(br2)Recovery after full ritual: $(#992032)$(l)500 DRP$()
